sentences: This item (FCCC/SB/2014/MISC.1 & Add.1 and MISC.2 & Add.1) was first considered by the SBSTA on 4 June.
Calling the flow of information from the SED to the ADP 'essential', Nauru, for AOSIS, called for the SED Co-Chairs to present a progress report to the ADP.
A joint contact group was co-chaired by Gertraud Wollansky (Austria) and Leon Charles (Grenada).
The SED and joint contact group discussions are summarized on page 11.
